title: 085: Awakening the Shaman Within with Alyson Charles
itunes:title: 085: Awakening the Shaman Within with Alyson Charles
description:
Totem animals, sound journeys, medicine bowls.. shamanism seems so interesting but lots of us are confused how it really works. I sat down with my dear friend Alyson Charles to discuss all about what a shaman is, what an awakening moment can look like and how to discover your totem animal.

We discuss:
-Her awakening moment and realization as a shaman
-How to determine your totem animal
-The animal medicine that came out for me that day (I was shocked!)
-Connecting with the spirit realm
-Discovering your truth as a spiritual teacher

If you’re interested in learning more about the shamanic path, this episode is for you.

Connect with Alyson at alysoncharles.com

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

Check out SpendidSpoon.com/Sahara for $25 off your order, nationwide.

Intro + Outro Music: Silent Ganges by Maneesh de Moor

Discover your Dharma with my free quiz at https://iamsahararose.com/

Connect with me for daily Ayurvedic and modern spiritual wisdom at: Instagram.com/iamsahararose
Facebook.com/iamsahararose Twitter.com/iamsahararose

Order My Books Eat Feel Fresh + Idiot's Guide to Ayurveda: https://www.iamsahararose.com/books
